attributes.action: Boycott India for human rights violations in Kashmir
attributes.additional_details: Because I am the victim of this occupation which is responsibility of this country some dark realities of colonial past
attributes.background: Boycott India for human rights violations in Kashmir,put pressure on Indian authorities to respect the human rights of people of Kashmir before and after occupation of Jammu and Kashmir,

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to use economic measure or sanctions, if this is something you would like to see happen.
